thread.title: Man arrested on Nantucket in connection with 2 sexual assaults - Massachusetts news
thread.title_full: Man arrested on Nantucket in connection with 2 sexual assaults - Massachusetts news

author: boston.com
title: Man arrested on Nantucket in connection with 2 sexual assaults - Massachusetts news
text:
Nantucket police on Tuesday arrested a man they believe sexually assaulted two women in separate cases. David Matterson was charged with kidnapping and rape in the 2008 and 2014 incidents according to the Cape Cod Times .
Matterson, originally from Jamaica, has been living on and off Nantucket since 2008. He is also a suspect in several other cases police told the Times .
Related Link Get today’s headlines right in your inbox “He was definitely a very legitimate threat to the women in this community,”Police Chief William Pittman told the Cape Cod Times .
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Nantucket police collected voluntary DNA samples from Jamaicans living on the island based on victims’s descriptions that the attacker had a Jamaican accent. Victims also described the attacker’s keys as having a membership card to a particular store attached to them, according to police.
By cross referencing the physical descriptions with a list of Jamaican members at the store and geographic area around where the assaults occurred, police narrowed down the list of suspects.
Matterson is scheduled to be arraigned Wednesday morning.
Read the full story by the Cape Cod Times .
